name: Free Kick - Copa America 2015 - Football FreeKick and Penalty shootout challenge
name_original: Free Kick - Copa America 2015 - Football FreeKick and Penalty shootout challenge
description:
Choose the team, crush your rivals, lead the online rating!

Help your favorite team to reach the top ranking! You can choose any team participating in the championship Euro Championship, then defeat selected opponent and climb up in the rankings! But be sure to remember: the other teams will be assisted by the same players as you are.

The game is totally about series of free kicks on goal. Scoring goals with the standard provisions will be interfered by: "wall", fickle wind, and, of course, agile goalkeeper.

At this point in the game, there are three basic modes:

- "Training" - a chance to hone their skills without risking positions in the rankings.
- "Arcade" - A series of penalty shots, results to be entered in the personal record on Gamecenter.
- "Championship" - a test for the best. Competition with other players for the title of best team.

Euro 2016 Version.
